0.0.6.en: Added support for Blitzwolf White Label Brand

0.0.7.en: Added support for Zemismart White Label Brand

0.1.0.en: Rewrite for SDK3 / Homey Firmware v5

0.1.1.en: Added support for more white label devices and killed some bugs

0.1.2.en: Rewrite to use IASZone Cluster (Good job adding support for it TED!)

0.1.4.en: Added support for Smart Plug (needs testing)

0.1.5.en: Added support for Samotech White Label Brand

0.1.6.en: Added support for 1 Gang Switch Module and 2 Gang Switch Module

0.1.7.en: Added product ID's and fixed 2 Gang Switch Module Channel 2

0.1.8.en: Added 1 Gang Dimmer Module, 2 Gang Dimmer Module and added support for Lonsonho White Label Brand

0.1.10.en: Added 1 Gang Wall Switch, 2 Gang Wall Switch and 3 Gang Wall Switch
